title: Grace Instant Green Banana Porridge 1.94 oz (Pack of 3)
features: Delicious breakfast porridge. baby adult porridge
description: PACK OF 3 Grace Instant Green Banana Porridge captures all the flavor and goodness of homemade Caribbean porridge. Now your entire family can have great tasting, nutritious porridge on-the-go, for breakfast or anytime. Just add water and it's ready in five minutes--no milk or sugar needed. Grace Instant Green Banana Porridge: Excellent source of vitamins A, B1, B2, B3 and calcium 0g trans fat Ready in 5 minutes Ingredients: Ingredients: Sugar, Green Banana Flour, Dry Whole Milk, Modified Food Starch, Salt, Spices, Tricalcium Phosphate (Anticaking Agent). Contains Milk Ingredients. May Contain Traces of Soy And Wheat. Directions: Instructions: Cooking directions: 1. open lid halfway And add boiling water to fill line on label, while stirring briskly. 2. close lid And let stand for 5 minutes. 3. remove lid, stir thoroughly again And enjoy. Caution: cup is hot, please handle with care, especially when serving children. Do not microwave in this container. Boil water in a separate microwave safe container, then follow cooking directions above. Store in a cool, dry place.
